tika-abh08t45:2_2: Sikhāpatti panassā udayabbayañāṇādīnaṁ aṭṭhañāṇānaṁ vasenāti āha ‘‘aṭṭhañāṇavasenā’’ti. Navamanti saccānulomikañāṇaṁ. Iti udayabbayādīni aṭṭha,
tika-abh08t45:3_1: Tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṁ ‘‘aṭṭha ñāṇānī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:3_3: tathāpi yathāvuttaṭṭhena paṭipadāñāṇadassanampi hotiyevāti tampi idha vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:3_4: Itarattha pana uppannamattaṁ appaguṇaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:3_6: Yato tadadhigamena aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatāva honti.
tika-abh08t45:3_7: Na hi udayabbayānaṁ paccakkhato paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṁ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṁ paṭipakkhappahānaṁ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t45:3_8: Asati ca paṭipakkhappahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṁ vajiramiva avihatavegatā tikhiṇavisadāditā vā,
tika-abh08t45:4_4: Muccituṁ icchatīti muccitukamyaṁ, cittaṁ, puggalo vā, tassa bhāvo muccitukamyatā,
tika-abh08t45:4_7: Nirapekkhatāya saṅkhārānaṁ upekkhanavasena pavattaṁ ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:4_10: Taṁ pana idanti āha ‘‘saccānulomañāṇanti, anulomaṁ pavuccatī’’ti.
tika-abh08t45:5_1: Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇassa pageva siddhattā kimatthaṁ puna tatthāpi abhiyogoti ce?
tika-abh08t45:5_3: Udayabbayañāṇañhi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṁ sallakkhetuṁ nāsakkhi,
tika-abh08t45:5_5: tasmā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthaṁ puna tattheva yogo kātabbo.
tika-abh08t45:5_8: tasmā udayabbayaṁ manasi katvā santatiṁ ugghāṭetvā aniccalakkhaṇaṁ,
tika-abh08t45:5_10: dhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhogaṁ katvā anattalakkhaṇañca sallakkhetvā ‘‘aniccā dukkhā anattā’’ti saṅkhārā punappunaṁ sammasitabbā.
tika-abh08t45:5_11: Tassevaṁ tulayato tīrayato yadā saṅkhāragataṁ attano lahuupaṭṭhānena,
tika-abh08t45:5_12: ñāṇassa ca tikkhatāya tirohituppādādibhedaṁ bhijjamānameva upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t45:5_14: tadā bhaṅgānupassanā nāma vipassanāñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:5_15: Tassa tadeva saṅkhāranirodhārammaṇabhaṅgānupassanaṁ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsesu saṅkhārā bhijjanasabhāvatāya yakkharakkhasādayo viya mahābhayaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t45:5_16: tadāssa bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti. Kiṁ panidaṁ ñāṇaṁ bhāyatīti? Na bhāyati.
tika-abh08t45:5_19: byasanāpannānaṁ pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhitānaṁ gahaṇena bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇanti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t45:6_0: Tassa taṁ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavagatesu saṅkhāresu tāṇaṁ vā leṇaṁ vā parāyaṇaṁ vā na paññāyati,
tika-abh08t45:6_1: ukkhittāsiko viya paccāmitto sādīnavā eva saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t45:6_2: tassa saṅkhārānaṁ ādīnavameva passantassa ādīnavañāṇaṁ nāma uppannaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:6_3: Tassevaṁ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passantassa yadā tibhavapariyāpannesu nibbedo uppajjati, ukkaṇṭhā saṇṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t45:6_5: tadāssa nibbidānupassanaṁ nāma ñāṇaṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:6_6: Tassa yadā iminā nibbidāñāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindantassa ekasaṅkhārepi cittaṁ na sajjati,
tika-abh08t45:6_7: sabbasmā saṅkhārato sappamukhagatassa viya maṇḍūkassa muccitukāmatā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t45:6_9: Tassevaṁ sabbasaṅkhārehi muccitukāmassa niccasukhasubhaattākārena pana upaṭṭhituṁ asamatthataṁ pāpetvā muccanassa upāyasampādanatthaṁ aniccantikatādīhi aniccalakkhaṇaṁ,
tika-abh08t45:6_11: tucchatādīhi anattalakkhaṇañca āropetvā sabbasaṅkhāragataṁ pariggaṇhantassa paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṁ nāma uppannaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:6_12: Tena panevaṁ pariggahitasaṅkhārena yā sā ‘‘suññamidaṁ attena vā attaniyena vā’’tiādinā dvikoṭikādibhedā suññatā vuttā, sā pariggahetabbā.
tika-abh08t45:6_13: Tassevaṁ suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā sammasantassa yadā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya vissaṭṭhabhariyassa viya saṅkhāragatesu upekkhā santiṭṭhati,
tika-abh08t45:6_16: Taṁ panetaṁ yāva nibbānaṁ na passati,
tika-abh08t45:6_17: tāva disākāko viya kūpakayaṭṭhiṁ punappunaṁ saṅkhārameva anabhimatampi nissāya saṅkhāravicinanepi majjhattameva hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t45:7_2: ‘‘Vuṭṭhāna’’nti hi bahiddhā nimittabhūtā abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto ceva ajjhattappavattato ca vuṭṭhahanato maggo vuccati,
tika-abh08t45:8_0: 1307.Tanti yaṁ sikhāpattā vipassanā saccānulomañāṇanti ca vuccati, taṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:8_1: Āsevantassāti punappunaṁ sammasanavasena sevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa.
tika-abh08t45:8_2: Tassa hi adhimokkhasaddhā bhāvanāvasena balavatarā nibbattissati,
tika-abh08t45:8_6: tatova anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṁ samatthā tikkhatamā saṅkhārupekkhā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t45:9_0: 1308-12.Aniccā…pe… votarateva sāti aniccādīsu ekena ākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṁ pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṁ otiṇṇā nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t45:9_2: Saṅkhārupekkhākatanayenāti aniccādinā ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayena, na sammasitanayena.
tika-abh08t45:9_4: Bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṁ katvāti bhavaṅgassa nivattanaṁ katvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṁ adatvā.
tika-abh08t45:10_3: ‘‘udayabbayavantānaṁyeva vata dhammānaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ uppādavaye addasā’’ti ca ‘‘bhaṅgavantānaṁyeva vata bhaṅgānupassanaṁ bhaṅgamaddasā’’ti ca ‘‘sabhayaṁyeva vata bhayatupaṭṭhānassa bhayato upaṭṭhita’’nti ca ‘‘sādīnaveyeva vata ādīnavānupassanaṁ ādīnavamaddasā’’ti ca ‘‘nibbinditabbeyeva vata nibbidāñāṇaṁ nibbinda’’nti ca ‘‘muccitabbamhiyeva vata muccitukamyatāñāṇaṁ muccitukāmaṁ jāta’’nti ca ‘‘paṭisaṅkhātabbameva vata paṭisaṅkhāñāṇena paṭisaṅkhāta’’nti ca ‘‘upekkhitabbaṁyeva vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita’’nti ca atthato vadamānaṁ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṁ ñāṇānaṁ katakiccatāya anulometi sabbāsaṁyeva vipassanānaṁ lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccattā,
tika-abh08t45:10_4: tathā upari ca ariyamagge sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ tāya paṭipadāya pattabbatāya.
tika-abh08t45:10_5: Na hi anulomañāṇe thūlathūlasaccapaṭicchādakasaṁkilesavikkhambhanavasena appavattante gotrabhuñāṇaṁ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t45:10_6: gotrabhuñāṇe ca anuppanne maggañāṇaṁ na uppajjati,
tika-abh08t45:10_11: Vuṭṭhānagāminiyāti saṅkhārārammaṇāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya. Pariyosānanti purimā koṭi.
tika-abh08t45:10_13: Asaṅkhatārammaṇaṁ pana sabbena sabbaṁ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ gacchati upetīti.
tika-abh08t45:10_14: Tatopi hi visesato ‘‘vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā’’ti vattabbataṁ labhatīti āha ‘‘ñeyyaṁ sabbappakārenā’’tiādi.
tika-abh08t45:11_1: ariyamaggādhiṭṭhānatāya mahantānaṁ sīlakkhandhādīnaṁ esanato gavesanato mahesinā sammāsambuddhena. Santakilesatāya santā. Yoganti bhāvanaṁ, bhāvanābhiyogaṁ vā.
